QuestData.Title: Noressa
QuestData.Description: She is still in there, $n. Noressa, my wife.$b$bShe is in the Promenade while we wait outside, preparing to strike. Who knows what has happened to her?$b$bPlease, friend, I fear the worst. Tell her there is hope outside.$b$bWe had a small house in the south of the Grand Promenade, by the water gardens. She will probably be there during this madness.
QuestData.RewardText: I cannot possibly thank you enough. We will be reunited, and I will see we are never separated again.
